stimulusHtml: Hector makes over half of the free throws he attempts in basketball games. During games, he taps his foot three times before attempting each free throw because he thinks it brings him good luck and that he would miss the shot without it. According to a behaviorist, this behavior is an example of which of the following?
choicesHtml:
Avoidance learning associated with previous attempts

A conditioned response after making free throws in the past

Avoidance of negative reinforcement

A superstitious behavior accidentally associated with successfully shooting free throws
